short_description: A procedural mystery game where you play as a detective racing against time to solve a murder case. As toxic gas slowly shrinks the map, find hidden clues and freely interrogate suspects with open-ended questioning. Manage your investigation under increasing pressure in a challenge against time.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Korean*, Simplified Chinese*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
